name: SpongeBob Squarepants: Lights, Camera, Pants
summary: The first multiplayer SpongeBob game, this collection of 30 party-style games allows players to compete for a role in a Bikini Bottom TV show, "The Adventures of Mermaidman & Barnacleboy." Up to four players will "audition" using both competitive and co-operative game play elements to earn roles in a 15-minute, full-fledged episode.
